title: Westcott 16451 8-Inch KleenEarth Recycled Scissors for Office and Home, Black
description: Just making a few small changes in how we do things can make a huge difference to our planet. That’s why Westcott uses recycled material in the eco-friendly designs of our KleenEarth products and packaging. The same quality standards are used in all our products whether we use new or recycled materials, so you can be sure this KleenEarth product will live up to your expectations, and you can feel good about doing your part to help the earth.
